channel.title: Lina’s Lessons on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Lina’s Lessons on Rusland 1

item.title: Learn Russian Wth New Channels
item.description: Go YouTubers This site would never have existed without all those Russian teachers (m/f) and vloggers who give their best in front of the camera, and make the results available to everyone. Their clips are inserted here (on many places) with gratitude, and with an encouragement to you (readers and viewers) to support the makers any way you can.

item.title: VERB VOCABULARY
item.description: Here is a selection of resources and channels you can use to do just that. Limited to the basic verbs, leaving out the special and more complex ones (verbs of motion, verbs on -ся, verbs with prepositions) for the most part.
